James Warren

Mandarin Syndicate

Website & Member Portal
Development CMS

Mandarin Syndicate are a friendly group of enthusiasts, self-managing a shared ownership narrowboat.

Visit Website

Brief

The Mandarin Syndicate wanted a website to promote share availability and provide a central hub of information for its members.

Key features include:

  • Boat Tour
  • Members News
  • Members Chat Area
  • Document Archive
  • Bookings Calendar
